author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERIN INTENSIFYING AS IT NEARS ITS CLOSEST APPROACH TO THE NORTH OF THE LEEWARD ISLANDS...
summary: ...ERIN INTENSIFYING AS IT NEARS ITS CLOSEST APPROACH TO THE NORTH OF THE LEEWARD ISLANDS... As of 8:00 PM AST Fri Aug 15 the center of Erin was located near 19.4, -58.5 with movement WNW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 982 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ERIN INTENSIFYING AS IT NEARS ITS CLOSEST APPROACH TO THE NORTH OF THE LEEWARD ISLANDS... As of 8:00 PM AST Fri Aug 15 the center of Erin was located near 19.4, -58.5 with movement WNW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 982 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
